title: What kinds of events exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: So many kinds, I couldn’t list them! And then every event has some unique factors. Maybe it’s the people attending, or the music playing, or the venue, and so on. Here’s a few Music festivalsExhibitionsConferencesSports EventsCorporate events (e.g. product launches)Royal events (weddings, deaths, etc.)Street partiesMeetings (may be small, but are still an event)Cruises (people don’t think of them as events, but they bring people together for a common purpose)

Many events exist , like marry, birthday, official, personal, secret parties and much more, but more important we understand nature of event , like Best Event Planner in Pakistan suggested or planed your event according to your choice and nature of event, specially if we discuss about Corporate Events …. ConferencesSeminarsMeetingsteam building eventBusiness dinnerpress conferenceopening ceremonyproduct launchesAward ceremonywedding ceremonyfamily eventsMuch more events belong different people to different countries
